title: Jean Becker: The Man I Knew
description: Jean Becker, former Chief of Staff to President George H.W. Bush, with Michael Smerconish on her book "The Man I Knew: The Amazing Story of George H. W. Bush's Post-Presidency". Original air date 2 June 2021. The book was published on 1 June 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Jean Becker)
